Articles.Content:
Hey, could someone make a NASA Space Shuttle Style launch clamps, particularly ones that would work fairly well with the CSS? I am getting tired of using the stock clamps and the FASA ones just don't look right in my opinion! These Clamps could also work with stock parts.

Edited February 23, 2015 by Sampa
Bump to keep this in knowledge until I know if someone is gonna work on this or not. I'd appreciate some response, you know!

Do you have any picture to show cause i'd like to see what's it's like? Is that inline clamps or something?

FASA ones seems pretty nice imo.

I'm just asking (i can't code and i'm focused on our coming soon mod : Kerbal Inventory System)

Do you have any picture to show cause i'd like to see what's it's like? Is that inline clamps or something?

FASA ones seems pretty nice imo.

I'm just asking (i can't code and i'm focused on our coming soon mod : Kerbal Inventory System)
